content:
Since we are going to include in the IG several pages concerning the Real world scenarios, I suggest to have for the same approach.

A possible page structure might be:
Overview: short introduction describing what we are talking about including also references to the current resources
FAIRness assessment: description of the main findings and gaps
Using FHIR: Description of where and how FHIR can be used to better support FAIR principles
Examples and reference Profiles:
Please let me know if you agree with this page structure, any suggestion about titles and content is more than welcome.

Please also keep track of any general suggestion, comment, approach and guidance about FAIRying with FHIR that you can derive from that example.
The plan is collect all of them in a separate page.
I agree with this proposed page structure. I will take it into account when we will cover the Healthcare data scenario.
